title: Fps locked at 60 after windows update. Vsync off Fps unlimited.
body:
My system would usually run 150+ fps, and after this windows update 10/1 or so it is capped at 60. I cant belive how many people are running under 100 fps, the gameplay is just not the same!

Ive done everything I did before to get my fps as high as possible and it aint working! 

Yes drivers current on graphics
Yes my fps max is at unlimited.
Yes vertical sync is off on nvidia graphics card and in game.


Thoughts? anyone!?

Thanks

Trikhoma

replies.body: A recent updated on Windows 10 has been causing a variety of issues for some players, including FPS.  As your first step I recommend disabling the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) which was auto-enabled with the update and causing some of these problems.  If the issue persists, give our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) a go to make sure your drivers and hardware are tuned up to game.  Hopefully that will solve your specific issue!

Thank you Porocles for your prompt response. That method worked for me as far as unlocking it from 60, it hit 200 fps but is unstable, shooting around from 100-200 fps.. Game play and experience is worlds better though from 60fps.  If you have any suggestions to get the fps stabilized I would appreciate it!

Thanks again!

Trikhoma
